title: My Husband Confessed to Sleeping with Prostitutes
description:
Even though Misty's husband admitted to seeing prostitutes throughout their marriage, she's worried about feeling lonely and losing financially if she chooses to leave him. - Dr. Laura: "It's up to you to choose the life you want between now and dead."

What's something that would drive you to leave your spouse? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:
